item.title: How to use the bot
item.description: To use the bot, the discord application is required, an account Login to discord. and a server must be created in the application to be able to access the interface and interact with it, with the following link you can invite the bot and start using it invite bot.
item.content:encoded: To use the bot, the discord application is required, an account Login to discord. and a server must be created in the application to be able to access the interface and interact with it, with the following link you can invite the bot and start using it invite bot.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: The purpose of this website is to give a brief explanation about the project developed throughout the semester on the subject, numerical analysis, which was intended to implement the numerical methods seen throughout the course.
item.content:encoded:
The purpose of this website is to give a brief explanation about the project developed throughout the semester on the subject, numerical analysis, which was intended to implement the numerical methods seen throughout the course.

A brief mention is made of the fallen soldier Esneider Zapata Arias, who unfortunately did not reach the end of the course
